entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
